scripts.build: yarn build-modules && yarn move-modules && cp package.json ./build/package.json
scripts.build-modules: concurrently "cd server && yarn build" "cd client && yarn build"
scripts.move-modules: mv -f server/build build && mv -f client/build build/frontend
scripts.test: (cd client && yarn test) && (cd server && yarn test)
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start" --kill-others
